name: Kingdom Quest
description: Kingdom Quest: The Beginning is a Puzzle Role-playing game using blockchain technology. The game will be available for PC and Mobile (Both Android and iOS). Players will possess all in-game characters, items, and currencies as NFT and tokens. Players use a group of heroes to solve mysterious puzzles, defeat encounter enemies and hunt valuable treasures. Each hero is a non-fungible token (NFT) with different attributes and strengths and can be earning experience (exp) to level up. The value of heroes is based on their classes and rarity.
